rules.description: Hold left_command to enter layer_44, unless layer_66 is active
└── hold down left_command and equal_sign in layer_44 to increase the size of the current window using raycast
└── hold down left_command and left_shift in layer_44 to send both command and shift
└── hold down left_command and tilde_by_the_shift in layer_44 to send both command and shift
└── hold down left_command and tap control to enter this layer
└── hold down left_command and hold down option to enter this layer
└── hold down left_command and tap tab to delete the word to the left
└── hold down left_command and tap c to enter the 44c_layer
└── tap c in the 44c_layer to send command + c (copy)
└── hold down left_command and tap d to increase the volume
└── hold down left_command and tap h for context-sensitive actions (Cursor, Excel, or default)
└── hold down left_command and tap j to send command + shift + j, only in Cursor AI editor on macOS
└── hold down left_command and tap k to send command + shift + k, only in Cursor AI editor on macOS
└── hold down left_command and tap k to jump to the top of the clipboard list in Copy 'Em (option + up_arrow)
└── hold down left_command and tap l to send option + shift + l
└── hold down left_command and tap l in Parallels to send 5x right_arrow
└── hold down left_command and tap m to enter the 44m_layer
└── tap m in the 44m_layer to send option + shift + m and jump to the currently playing tab in Vivaldi
└── hold down left_command and tap n to enter the 44n_layer
└── tap n in the 44n_layer to send option + shift + n this will dismiss the current notification using supercharge.app
└── tap l in the 44n_layer to run jumpTo_SimpleLogin.sh
└── hold down left_command and tap v to enter the 44v_layer
└── tap v in the 44v_layer to send command + v (paste)
└── hold down left_command and tap f1 to reduce the brightness
└── hold down left_command and tap f2 to increase the brightness
└── hold down left_command and tap backspace to send control + option + plus
└── hold down left_command and tap enter to send control + option + minus
└── hold down left_command and tap s to decrease the volume
└── hold down left_command and tap space to open Raycast
└── tap left command and tap comma to open the settings menu in most apps
└── hold down left_command and tap period to enter the 44_period_layer
└── tap period in 44_period_layer to send control option shift f6
Hold down left_shift to enter this layer
In layer_66, tapping 'enter' sends shift + enter
In layer_66, tapping 'a' sends shift + a
In layer_66, tapping 'b' sends shift + b
In layer_66, tapping 'c' sends shift + c
In layer_66, tapping 'd' sends shift + d
In layer_66, tapping 'e' sends shift + e
In layer_66, tapping 'f' sends shift + f
In layer_66, tapping 'g' sends shift + g
In layer_66, tapping 'h' sends shift + h
In layer_66, tapping 'i' sends shift + i
In layer_66, tapping 'j' sends shift + j
In layer_66, tapping 'k' sends shift + k
In layer_66, tapping 'l' sends shift + l
In layer_66, tapping 'm' sends shift + m
In layer_66, tapping 'n' sends shift + n
In layer_66, tapping 'o' sends shift + o
In layer_66, tapping 'p' sends shift + p
In layer_66, tapping 'q' sends shift + q
In layer_66, tapping 'r' sends shift + r
In layer_66, tapping 's' sends shift + s
In layer_66, tapping 't' sends shift + t
In layer_66, tapping 'u' sends shift + u
In layer_66, tapping 'v' sends shift + v
In layer_66, tapping 'w' sends shift + w
In layer_66, tapping 'x' sends shift + x
In layer_66, tapping 'y' sends shift + y
In layer_66, tapping 'z' sends shift + z
In layer_66, tapping 'quote' sends shift + quote
In layer_66, tapping 'semicolon' sends shift + semicolon (to produce colon)
In layer_66, tapping '`' sends shift + grave_accent_and_tilde (to produce ~)
In layer_66, tapping '1' sends shift + 1 (to produce exclamation mark)
In layer_66, tapping '2' sends shift + 2 (to produce @)
In layer_66, tapping '3' sends shift + 3 (to produce #)
In layer_66, tapping '4' sends shift + 4 (to produce $)
In layer_66, tapping '5' sends shift + 5 (to produce %)
In layer_66, tapping '6' sends shift + 6 (to produce ^)
In layer_66, tapping '7' sends shift + 7 (to produce &)
In layer_66, tapping '8' sends shift + 8 (to produce *)
In layer_66, tapping '9' sends shift + 9 (to produce ( )
In layer_66, tapping '0' sends shift + 0 (to produce ) )
In layer_66, tapping '-' sends shift + hyphen (to produce _)
In layer_66, tapping '=' sends shift + equal_sign (to produce +)
In layer_66, tapping '[' sends shift + open_bracket (to produce { )
In layer_66, tapping ']' sends shift + close_bracket (to produce } )
In layer_66, tapping '\' sends shift + backslash (to produce | )
In layer_66, tapping ',' sends shift + comma (to produce < )
In layer_66, tapping '.' sends shift + period (to produce > )
In layer_66, tapping '/' sends shift + slash (to produce ? )
Enter capslock_shift_layer by tapping caps_lock while in layer_66. Exits other related layers.
└── in 66_layer a will send uppercase a
└── hold down left_shift and tap option to send shift + option
└── hold down left_shift and tap control to send shift + control
└── hold down left_shift and tap command to send command + shift

In capslock_shift_layer, h sends shift+left_arrow
In capslock_shift_layer, j sends shift+left_arrow

In capslock_shift_layer, l sends shift+left_arrow
CapsLock layer with Hammerspoon overlay indicator
In capslock_layer, pressing enter sends command+enter
jump to playing tab in vivaldi
enter space_layer by pressing spacebar in capslock_layer with hammerspoon overlay indicator
└── semicolon in space_layer will enter a layer called layer_77
└── Escape in layer_77 will exit the layer and destroy Hammerspoon GUI
└── Escape in layer_77 will exit the layer and destroy Hammerspoon GUI
└── tap 'h' in layer_77 to send shift + option + right_arrow
└── tap 'l' in layer_77 to send shift + option + right_arrow
capslock + spacebar + h will send Control + Shift + tab
capslock + spacebar + i will enter 22i_layer
Tapping 'i' in 22i_layer sends Command+H and exits the layer
└── j in the space_layer will send control + alt + j
└── j in the space_layer will send control + alt + j
k in the space_layer will send control + alt + k
└── m in the space_layer will enter the 22m_layer
└── tapping 'h' in the m_layer will open_or_cycle to gemini
└── tapping 'm' in the 22m_layer will open_or_cycle to Todoist
└── tapping 'm' in the 22m_layer will open_or_cycle to my github repos
└── p in the space_layer will enter the 22p_layer
└── p in the 22p_layer will send option + f12 to open yoink
22po should send control + option + command + p to open the raycast clipboard
└── u in the space_layer will enter the 22u_layer
└── tapping 'h' in the 22u_layer will snap current window to the left using Raycast
└── tapping 'h' in the 22u_layer will open_or_cycle to gemini
└── tapping 'l' in the 22u_layer will snap current window to the right using Raycast
SEMICOLON == RIGHT_SHIFT (except with left_shift, in a_layer and capslock_layer)
Keys send shifted version when semicolon_layer
When 'd' is pressed in semicolon_layer layer, enter ee_d_layer
When 'h' is pressed in ee_d_layer, send control+option+left_arrow
When 'j' is pressed in ee_d_layer, send control+option+down_arrow
When 'k' is pressed in ee_d_layer, send control+option+up_arrow
When 'l' is pressed in ee_d_layer, send control + option + right_arrow
When 'l' is pressed in semicolon_layer layer, enter l_layer
└── 4 in the l_layer will send the euro sign
└── r in the l_layer will send control+r

rules.bookmark: arrow_keys hjkl p to bring up clipboard
rules.description: capslock + h + j + k + l will send arrow keys

manipulators.description: Disable P mapping for Parallels Windows App

rules.description: escape + semicolon will send underscore
└── hold 'a' to enter a_layer
└── tap quote in the a_layer to send equals sign
└── tap comma in the a_layer to send open bracket
└── tap period in the a_layer to send close bracket
└── tap j in the a_layer to enter the aj_layer
└── tap j in the aj_layer to open raycast/file-search / Everything for macOS
└── tap 'h' in a_layer to move left
└── tap 'l' in a_layer to move right
└── tap 'n' in a_layer to send command + n
In a_layer, p sends right_click
In a_layer, p sends right_click
└── tap ';' in a_layer will paste the hyphen -
└── tapping right_command in a_layer will send 'control enter' '^enter' 'control + enter'
└── tapping enter in a_layer will send 'command + enter'
└── hold 'u' in a_layer to enter au_layer
└── hold 's' to enter s_layer
In s_layer, p sends command + shift p
└── In s_layer, comma sends command + shift + comma
└── hold 'd' to enter ee_d_layer
└── tapping 'j' in ee_d_layer will send send control option down
└── tapping 'k' in ee_d_layer will send send control option up
└── tapping 'backspace' in the capslock_layer will send 'delete'
└── tapping 'y' in capslock_layer to enter 'y_layer'
capslock + y + h will open textsniper
capslock + y + j will capture the current area of the screen using Cleanshot x
capslock + y + p will open copy a file path using ⌘⇧p

rules.bookmark: Enter escape_u_layer uu uu eeu eeu uuu uuu
rules.description: capslock + u will enter u layer
capslock + uh will act as Home
capslock + uj will send copy and select all
capslock + ul will act as End
capslock + uo will send control + f in specific browsers and VSCode
capslock + uu will send undo
capslock + ui will send control + f11 to toggle off all ui elements in Vivaldi, Cursor and VSCode
Enter i_layer
Capslock + i + y will toggle the word to the left between UPPERCASE and lowercase
Capslock + i + u will transform the word to the left to Title Case
capsLock + i + i will send a right_click
capslock + i + h will delete and copy the word to the left
capslock + i + j will copy and delete from the cursor to the start of the line
capslock + i + k will copy and delete an entire line
capslock + i + l will copy and delete from the cursor to the end of the line
escape + i + o will insert curly braces with cursor between them
capslock + o will enter the o_layer
capsLock + oo will maximize the current window using raycast

rules.bookmark: Start of m_layer m m mm mm (Default)
rules.description: └── tap 'm' in the capslock_layer to enter m_layer
└── tap 'h' in m_layer will open chatgpt
In m_layer, tapping 'j' opens Zen (Chrome app) and returns to capslock_layer
└── tap 'k' in m_layer will open Vivaldi
└── l in the m_layer will open the Warp terminal
└── tap 'm' in m_layer will open Cursor and destroy the GUI
capslock + mn will open or cycle to email
└── tap 'o' in m_layer will open telegram
└── tap 'p' in m_layer will open Excel
└── tapping 'm' in the m_layer will open_or_cycle to my github repos
└── tap ',' in m_layer to open/cycle VSCode

rules.bookmark: Enter n_layer nn nn n n nnn nnn
rules.description: Enter n_layer and close n_layer
└── capslock + n + l == open simplelogin app
capslock + n + n inserts varitycolgate@gmail.com (via direct paste)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'set temp_clipboard to the clipboard' -e 'set the clipboard to "varitycolgate@gmail.com"' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using command down' -e 'delay 0.1' -e 'set the clipboard to temp_clipboard'

rules.description: capslock + n + o == snippety.app == cocF4

capslock + spacebar + o will enter baselayer_o

capslock + spacebar + o + o will toggle Fullscreen
capslock + spacebar + o + o will toggle Fullscreen
capslock + tab will act as command + shift + function key
control + f3 will open Mission Control
command + r will send Redo in VSCode and Neovide, Shift+Cmd+Z in Chrome and Brave
